info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 8:19PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sanpete...northwestern Emery and west central Carbon Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 818 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mount Pleasant, or near Moroni, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moroni, Mount Pleasant, Scofield, Fairview, Fountain Green, Spring City, Milburn and Clear Creek. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 269 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
